title: 03/15/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 03/15/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin believes Russell Wilson needs to broaden his list of potential teams he would accept a trade to including this sleeper team in the NFC. He also puts Drew Brees’ career into context after he officially announced his retirement from the NFL. Colin shares why he was right about Cam Newton and wrong about Dak Prescott. Plus, former Drew Brees teammate and current Saints LB Demario Davis joins the show to share stories about his time playing with the future Hall of Fame QB.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
